alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 9:06PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT KAUAI IN KAUAI COUNTY THROUGH 1000 PM HST... At 905 PM HST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Hanapepe, or 24 miles southwest of Lihue, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 35 to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Lihue, Kapaa, Kalaheo, Kekaha, Princeville, Kilauea, Anahola, Alakai Swamp Trails, Hanalei, Na Pali State Park, Omao, Wainiha, North Fork Wailua Trails, Moloaa, Waimea, Wailua Homesteads, Wailua, Hanapepe, Koloa, and Poipu. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest
